bibl.bibl: Mackintosh, Daniel. 1881. On the precise mode of accumulation and derivation of the Moel-Tryfan shelly deposits; on the discovery of similar high-level deposits along the eastern slopes of the Welsh mountains; and on the existence of drift-zones, showing probable variations in the rate of submergence. [Read 27 April 1881.] Quarterly Journal of the Geological Society of London 37: 351–69.
